output_list.reason: The mintToken function allows an owner to mint arbitrary amount of tokens to any user, causing an integer overflow in totalSupply.
The transferFrom function returns a bool value without considering the overflow, allowing unauthorized users to transfer tokens.
The ToOwner function can be called by anyone, allowing unauthorized users to claim ownership and funds.
The claimThrone function allows any user to become the king, causing the contract to be unusable.
The mintToken function allows an owner to mint arbitrary amount of tokens to any user, causing an integer overflow in totalSupply.
